entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:37 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:42 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
